snippet.title: Omen of Sorrow - PlayStation Experience 2016: Reveal Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Omen of Sorrow is a new fighting game, with a setting inspired by literature, myth and horror.

http://www.omenofsorrow.com

From the AOne Games team comes this fantasy fighting game, featuring the monsters of classic horror and giving them a new twist. Delve into its rich mythology, and discover its fast paced combat in classic 2-D style--as you fight for your life against werewolves, vampires and other creatures of lore.

Video content is of early, pre-Alpha stage; features, moves, graphics and other assets may not be final. 

http://www.aonegames.com

AOne Games
